remarks: Composition of a ` ZRHom ` homomorphism and the sign function for a finite permutation.  (Contributed by AV, 27-Dec-2018.)
statement:
zrhcofipsgn.p $e |- P = ( Base ` ( SymGrp ` N ) ) $.
zrhcofipsgn.y $e |- Y = ( ZRHom ` R ) $.
zrhcofipsgn.s $e |- S = ( pmSgn ` N ) $.
zrhcofipsgn $p |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ Q e. P ) -> ( ( Y o. S ) ` Q ) = ( Y ` ( S ` Q ) ) ) $.
